subject: Welcome to SkillLift!
content: Welcome to SkillLift! I'm excited to be your tutor. Let's start your learning journey together.

subject: Assignment Feedback
content: Great work on your last assignment! You're making excellent progress. Keep up the good work!

subject: Upcoming Live Class
content: Don't forget about our live class tomorrow at 2 PM. We'll be covering advanced JavaScript concepts.
